metadata.title: CVE-2024-27068 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:thermal/drivers/mediatek/lvts_thermal: Fix a memory leak in an errorhandling pathIf devm_krealloc() fails, then 'efuse' is leaking.So free it to avoid a leak.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
